paper_abstract: Using fixed point method, we prove the Hyers-Ulam stability of the following additive functional equation Sigma(m)(i=1) f(ma(i) + Sigma(m)(j=1,j not equal 1) a(j)) + f (Sigma(m)(i=1) a(i)) = 2 f (Sigma(m)(i=1) a(i)) in Banach modules over a unital C*-algebra and in non-Archimedean Banach modules over a unital C*-algebra.
paper_title: ORTHOGONAL STABILITY OF AN ADDITIVE FUNCTIONAL EQUATION IN BANACH MODULES OVER A C*-ALGEBRA
